snippet: Will Hill will be suspended for the first four games of the N.F.L. season for violating the league’s substance-abuse policy, the team said.
abstract: New York Giants safety Will Hill will be suspended for first four games of NFL season for violating league's substance-abuse policy; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Will Hill will be suspended for the first four games of the N.F.L. season for violating the league’s substance-abuse policy, the team said.

headline.main: Giants Safety Is Suspended for Drug Violation
headline.print_headline: Giants Safety Suspended for Drug Violation
